== Fields

=== `cast`

Whether to try to cast values that are numbers and booleans to the right type. Default: all values are strings.

*Type*: `bool`

*Default*: `false`

=== `operator`

An XML <<operators, operation>> to apply to messages.

*Type*: `string`

*Default*: `""`

*Options*: `to_json`
